remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更的摺疊狀態，讓所有選取的節點會顯示。The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a so that all the checked nodes are visible. 首先，會摺疊所有節點，並處理常式加入至事件。First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the event. 接著，所有節點展開。Next, all the nodes are expanded. 事件處理常式決定指定的節點是否有簽入的子節點。The event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked. 如果節點沒有已檢查的子系，擴充會取消該節點。If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node. 為了讓正常節點展開，按一下節點旁邊的加號時，然後移除事件處理常式。In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the event handler is then removed. 此行為也可以藉由處理實作事件，該主題的範例所示。This behavior can also be implemented by handling the event, as illustrated in the example for that topic.
